column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: Units from Chamkar Mon District Unity Command inspected a massage parlor
column5: which was actually a front for illegal electronic gambling
column6: and confiscated several game consoles at 9:30 pm on September 10 2020. The “Iya Chinese Massage Shop” is located in Village 10
column8: Khan Chamkarmon.------According to the police sources
column9: various district officials inspected the massage parlor which had a valid permit for massage
column10: but not gambling.------According to the same source
column11: the authorities decided to confiscate gambling tables including fishing games to be stored at Chamkarmon district waiting to be processed. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
